definition: sound of an explosion/sound of sth throbbing or bursting
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to collapse/to fall into ruins/death of king or emperor/demise

sentences.english: Dying fish were flopping about on the wooden boards.
sentences.chinese: 快要死的魚在木板上吧嗒吧嗒地亂嘣。

sentences.english: She was chomping away on a bagel.
sentences.chinese: 她在嘎蹦嘎嘣地啃着一個硬麪包圈。

sentences.english: So they press the button, get the treat, but also the bonk.
sentences.chinese: 他們按下了按鈕，得到了響應，也被彈了個腦嘣。

sentences.english: My breath stopped , and a vein began to pound in my right temple.
sentences.chinese: 我的呼吸停止了，我的右太陽穴的血管嘣嘣直跳。

sentences.english: My breath stopped , and a vein began to pound in my right temple.
sentences.chinese: 我的呼吸停止了，我的右太陽穴的血管嘣嘣直跳。

sentences.english: The bow twanged and the arrow whistled through the air.
sentences.chinese: 那張弓發出‘嘣’的一聲，箭隨之呼嘯而去。

sentences.english: The fish we'd caught flopped about in the bottom of the boat.
sentences.chinese: 我們捕到的魚在船底叭達叭達地亂嘣。

definition: (onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
(onom.) breaking or snapping/(coll.) cut it out/stop it/also written 喀嚓[ka1 cha1]
(onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
(onom.) to squeak (of mice)/to chirp or peep (of small birds)
